author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. 10-year yield stays below 3 pct after U.S. Q1 GDP data
text:
April 27, 2018 / 1:18 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago U.S. 10-year yield stays below 3 pct after U.S. Q1 GDP data Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. Treasury yields trimmed their earlier fall on Friday with the 10-year yield remaining below 3 percent following the governmentâ€™s reading of a stronger-than-forecast 2.3 percent increase in economic growth in the first quarter.
At 8:43 a.m. (1443 GMT), the yield on 10-year Treasury notes was down 0.9 basis point at 2.981 percent, while two-year note yield was 0.8 basis point higher at 2.496 percent. Reporting by Richard Leong; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
